body: Verified still repros on latest daily.
MaterializeJsonEntityCollection has type constraint so that i can use ICollection<T>.Add method. We could/should use collection accessor AddStandalone instead

issue.title: [SMALL] Fix to #31760 - System.ArgumentException on List<T> with OwnsOne ToJson

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
We were using type constraint on MaterializeJsonEntityCollection, so that we could leverage ICollection.Add. Fix is to use collection accessor AddStandalone instead.

Fixes #31760

body:
@maumar thank you for getting this issue resolved so promptly.

Cheers, Nick
